description.en: International investment platform Magic Trading, is entering a crucial phase of asset digitalization. Following a detailed scaling plan, the company will go through a step-by-step process of creating a global society. From now on, every partner of the company will be able to become a full owner of MTK Token. Assets of this direction have already managed to recommend themselves as an effective investment solution. Each partner of the company will be able to purchase a digital asset both on exchanges and on the Magic Trading platform.
